mapper.select: SELECT i.imgname, i.imgpath, imgtype, imgext, g.goodsno, g.gcode, g.gname, g.ginfo, g.gprice, g.gsale FROM goods g INNER JOIN imgs i ON g.goodsno = i.goodsno WHERE g.goodsno = #{goodsno} AND i.imgtype = "A";

select *, (SELECT count(h.goodsno) from heart h where h.goodsno = g.goodsno) AS heartCnt from goods g INNER JOIN imgs i on g.goodsno = i.goodsno WHERE i.imgtype="A" order by heartCnt desc;
